choices.B: Create and then modify an XML file named SkypeSettings.xml.
choices.A: Create a new Teams update policy.
choices.C: Create and then modify an XML file named TeamsSettings.xml.

discussion.content:
Definitely B is correct.
To enable public preview on Teams Rooms on Windows, you can follow these steps
1-Create an XML file with the line enable public preview true and save it as skype settings.xml.
2-Copy the XML file to a specific folder under the Windows store app directory.
3-Reboot the Teams Rooms console and check for a message in the upper right corner that indicates public preview is enabled.

Selected Answer: B
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/rooms/xml-config-file

Option <EnablePublicPreview> Disabled by default. If true, public preview is enabled and end-users can access features in public preview on enabled Teams Rooms.
I think Answer B is correct https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/rooms/xml-config-file

Selected Answer: A
I think A is correct:
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/public-preview-doc-updates

comments.content: No, I correct myself: B is correct:) This is Teams room, so option is inside skypesettings.xml file

questions.question_text:
You are deploying a Teams Rooms on Windows device.

You need to enable public preview to test newly released beta features.

What should you do?

HOTSPOT
-

You have a Microsoft 365 E5 subscription that uses Microsoft Teams.

You plan to deploy phones to a shared common area.

You need to ensure that users can temporarily sign in to each phone and automatically sign out during inactivity.

How should you complete the PowerShell command? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

Your company has an office in Seattle.
The default dial-in number for the company's Microsoft Teams meetings has an area code of 425.
The company does NOT have an office in New York. However, most of the company's customer are in New York.
You need to get a new default dial in number that has a local 718 area code You will NOT define additional location information in Teams.
Which two actions should you perform before you assign the bridge? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.E: Get a Dedicated conference bridge (Toll) number
choices.B: Search for new numbers by using a 718 area code
choices.D: Search for new numbers by using New York
choices.A: Get an auto attendant toll free number
choices.C: Get a Dedicated conference bridge (Toll Free) number

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BE
B and E are correct. The search only works with one of the categories:
- Area code
- City name
- Postal code
B and D. Nobody asked for a toll number. They want a local number.

comments.content: you do not have to use location data are the key words

questions.question_text:
You are deploying a Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows device.

You have a file named Wallpaper.jpg that contains a company-branded wallpaper graphic.

You need to ensure that the device displays the company-branded wallpaper.

Which two actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.E: Upload Wallpaper.jpg to a folder on the device.
choices.A: Set the Teams Rooms theme to Custom.
choices.D: Set the Teams Rooms theme to Default.
choices.B: Upload Wallpaper.jpg to the global (Org-wide default) customization policy.
